summary: FRONT / TOP  OF  DASHBOARD  SEPARATING  AND  DELAMINATING  FROM  THE INTERIOR  CABIN  OF  VEHICLE AND EXPENDING TO A  POINT  WERE THE  ONE  PIECE EXPOSING  OPEN  VOID SPACE AND  SETTING OFF SENSORS  ON   AIR  BAGS  BY   PINCHING  AND SENDING A  MESSAGE THAT  THE   AIR  BAGS ARE  DEFECTIVE. I  HAVE SEEN  NO  OF SAME  MODEL  BUICKS  WITH  SIMILAR  DEFECTS AND  PROBLEMS  FROM  2000  TO  2004  AND NEWER  MODELS ON THE ROAD. WHEN  REQUESTED FOR EVALUATION  FROM  TWO BUICK / GM DEALERS  THEY  HAD  NO SOLUTION   TO THE  ISSUE  OR  OFFER A  SOLUTION TO THE   SAFETY ISSUE.  REQUEST FOR  INVESTIGATION TO  GM  FOR SOLUTION  AND  NOTICE TO THE  OWNERS OF  SIMILAR CARS  TO REPORT SAME OR  SIM.  PROBLEMS.     *TR
